reviewText: Solid short documentary about a shocking case of racism in Louisiana, and a seriously bigoted District Attorney.
What a crock of s*** this is. Nothing but lies & misconception. The truth would not make a good story. The truth would be too typical. Don't fall for this garbage.

The news was more intrested in talking about pop stars in rehab than the Jena 6. Depending on the newspapers you read they were either violent killers or innocent victims. This told me exactly what happened and shows that there are some serious problems with the judicial system
